thread.title: Buzzy, Parisian, quaint - Review
thread.title_full: Buzzy, Parisian, quaint - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: D C
title: Buzzy, Parisian, quaint - Review
text:
Spent a couple of nights here. Good central location. Lovely decorated entrance with an inviting bar just behind the check-in area. The Hilton brand hasn't overtake the old-fashion Parisian atmosphere: excellent (and I'm a Hilton gold member).
Rooms: I had an upgrade on the 4th floor(out of 5) and it was really small. I liked the wall paper, the deco, the view, the bathroom.. but the actual bedroom was really small (albeit European capital cities small..)
